[{"id":"134","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","tenbaiviet_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Poseidon Nha Trang t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c tr&ecirc;n con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Tr\u1ea7n Quang Kh\u1ea3i, m\u1ed9t v\u1ecb tr&iacute; v&ocirc; c&ugrave;ng thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n ngay t\u1ea1i trung t&acirc;m th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 Nha Trang xinh \u0111\u1eb9p.&nbsp;H\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng ph&ograve;ng ngh\u1ec9 trong kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 c&aacute;c thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb ti\u1ec7n nghi v\u1edbi t\u1ea7m nh&igrave;n sang tr\u1ecdng h\u01b0\u1edbng ra to&agrave;n th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i ngo&agrave;i tr\u1eddi, trung t&acirc;m th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c, qu\u1ea7y bar c\u1ea1nh h\u1ed3 b\u01a1i, ph&ograve;ng t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng, qu\u1ea7y h&agrave;ng l\u01b0u ni\u1ec7m v&agrave; b&agrave;n th&ocirc;ng tin du l\u1ecbch .<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n Poseidon Nha Trang n\u1ed5i b\u1eadt b\u1edfi ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c \u0111\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng ph\u01b0\u01a1ng T&acirc;y &ndash; t\u1ed1i gi\u1ea3n m&agrave; sang tr\u1ecdng, hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p. Kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n c&oacute; t\u1ed5ng c\u1ed9ng 138 ph&ograve;ng, trong \u0111&oacute; c&oacute; 34 ph&ograve;ng Superior, 52 ph&ograve;ng Premier Cityview, 21 ph&ograve;ng Deluxe Seaview with Balcony, 7 ph&ograve;ng Deluxe Cityview with Balcony, 14 ph&ograve;ng Luxury Seaview, 2 ph&ograve;ng Poseidon Suite v&agrave; 7 ph&ograve;ng Family Executive. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c ph&ograve;ng \u0111\u1ec1u c&oacute; di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch r\u1ed9ng r&atilde;i, tho&aacute;ng m&aacute;t h\u01b0\u1edbng bi\u1ec3n ho\u1eb7c th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 &ndash; \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c trang b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 ti\u1ec7n nghi hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cao c\u1ea5p .<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"613\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/unnamed-1.jpg\" width=\"536\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>","noidung_en":"","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"tags_vi":"","tags_en":"","tags_cn":null,"tags_jp":null,"seo_name":"poseidon-nha-trang","id_parent_muti":"","catasort":"0","icon":"1691575218_2.jpg","icon_hover":null,"dowload":null,"dowload_text":"","duongdantin":"datafiles","ngaydang":"1691575218","capnhat":"0","soluotxem":"14","step":"3","giatien":"0","giakm":"0","seo_title_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_title_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_title_cn":null,"seo_title_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_keywords_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_keywords_cn":null,"seo_keywords_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG","seo_description_en":"POSEIDON NHA TRANG HOTEL","seo_description_cn":null,"seo_description_jp":null,"opt_km":"0","opt":"0","opt1":"0","opt2":"0","opt3":"0","opt4":"0","opt5":"0","top_video":"0","p1":"","p2":"0","p3":"","link_video":"","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","num_3":"0","num_4":"0","showhi":"1","tinh_nang":"","thuoc_tinh_1_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_1_en":"","thuoc_tinh_1_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_1_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_2_en":"","thuoc_tinh_2_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_2_jp":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_vi":"","thuoc_tinh_3_en":"","thuoc_tinh_3_cn":null,"thuoc_tinh_3_jp":null,"google_map":"","is_dongdau":"0","time_dongdau":"0"}]
